name: RunningZ
description:
Team name: CurryDev

I'm a solo developer and this is my entry for the Epic MegaJam 2021 - Running out of space.

Used assets

  • Third person / Vehicle BP templates.
  • Lt. Belica (Epic Paragon asset)
  • Polygon - Town pack (https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/polygon-town-pack)
  • Polygon - City pack (https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/polygon-city-pack)
  • Used sounds from:
    • https://freesound.org/
    • https://www.weloveindies.com/en
    • (recorded couple myself)

You are tasked to help nearby colonies survive. Pick up ammo and supplies around the map and deliver them in time at the numerous (active) colonies. Make sure to keep an eye out for the billboards!

Controls

  • WASD or left stick to move
  • Q or E / Left or Right bumper to use ammo and supply box that are carried on person (resp.)
  • F to interact
    • Enter car on side
    • Transfer ammo/supplies near trunk
  • Left mouse button / Right trigger  to fire
  • Left shift to sprint

Instructions

  • Find ammo (green) and supply (red) boxes around the map.
  • Use them yourself if you run out of ammo or health.
  • Put them in your trunk (interact with trunk of car) and bring them to colonies in need!
